Class AbstractRequirementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.controller.AbstractRequirementController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GetParentRequirementController, GetRequirementsController

    public abstract class AbstractRequirementController
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract requirement controller to be extended by other classes that need to receive requirements
